casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Max Tracy EARLS 227P14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Amar Majmundar, Senior Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Max Tracy Earls, for Earls, Max Tracy

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of September 2018 by Defendant for Rehearing En Banc Constitutional Question:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
